de.saxsys.jfx.mvvm.notifications

Interface NotificationCenter


  • public interface NotificationCenter
    Central component to provide a notification mechanism. You can add observers by using keys to get notifications for it. If you want you can pass an
    Author:
    sialcasa

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserverForName(String name, NotificationObserver observer)
      Add an observer to the @MVVMNotificationCenter which gets notifications for the given @String.
      void postNotification(String name, Object... objects)
      Post a notification to all @MVVMNotificationObserver which are registered with the given @String.
      void removeObserver(NotificationObserver observer)
      Remove all registrations of an @MVVMNotificationObserver.
      void removeObserverForName(String name, NotificationObserver observer)
      Removes an observer from the @MVVMNotificationCenter.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserverForName

        void addObserverForName(String name,
                        NotificationObserver observer)
        Add an observer to the @MVVMNotificationCenter which gets notifications for the given @String.
        Parameters:
        name - key of the notification to listen
        observer - which listens for the notification

      • removeObserverForName

        void removeObserverForName(String name,
                           NotificationObserver observer)
        Removes an observer from the @MVVMNotificationCenter.
        Parameters:
        name - key of the notification to remove
        observer - which listens for the notification

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(NotificationObserver observer)
        Remove all registrations of an @MVVMNotificationObserver.
        Parameters:
        observer - for remove all notifications

      • postNotification

        void postNotification(String name,
                      Object... objects)
        Post a notification to all @MVVMNotificationObserver which are registered with the given @String. You can pass @Object[].
        Parameters:
        name - of the notification which sould be send
        objects - which should be passed
